snippet: The Kansas City Royals signed General Manager Dayton Moore and Manager Ned Yost to contract extensions, ensuring that the leadership of the World Series champions would remain intact.
abstract: Kansas City Royals General Manager Dayton Moore and Manager Ned Yost sign contract extensions, keeping World Series champions leadership intact; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals signed General Manager Dayton Moore and Manager Ned Yost to contract extensions, ensuring that the leadership of the World Series champions would remain intact.

headline.main: Royals Sign Dayton Moore and Ned Yost
